entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 10:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero with frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero with frost. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
